title: See How This AI Improvised With A Musican To Create A Musical Dialogue In Real-Time
description: A 75-minute live performance at the Guildhall School of Music in London featured an improvised performance between a human and an AI that resulted in a tonal musical dialogue in real-time.

title: The Future Of Cyberpunk Fantasy Is Now
description: The tension of the cyberpunk genre coms from the diverging paths of humanity’s future. Three games currently on Kickstarter add fantasy to the mix.

title: Viral Video Of Ukraine War ‘Crisis Actors’ In Body Bags Is Totally Fake
description: Have you seen that viral video on Facebook and Twitter, purporting to show a newscast about the war in Ukraine, but one of the “dead” people in a body bag starts moving? It's fake.

title: Apple’s Surprising MacBook Air Decision
description: Apple's own filings suggest the next MacBook Air is coming sooner than you may think.

title: Honor MWC 2023 Event: How To Watch Magic Vs, Magic 5 Pro Launch
description: Honor is all set to introduce its Galaxy Z Fold 4 competitor, Magic Vs outside of China at the MWC launch event, which will also include its new flagship Magic 5 series.

title: Two Nearby Planets Are Perfect To Check For Alien Life
description: A pair of worlds that are just around the corner in cosmic terms look to be in the right spot to potentially host life as we know it.

title: H5N1 Bird Flu Kills 11 Year Old Girl In Cambodia, Father Infected
description: A World Health Organization (WHO) official has called the global H5N1 avian influenza situation "worrying."

title: Apple VR Headset May Launch Alongside iPhone 15, Says Analyst
description: The Apple mixed reality headset is unlikely to launch as early as some have hoped and predicted.

title: Review: Treblab HD Max Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Treblab HD Max is a mid-sized portable Bluetooth speaker with four drivers, 50W of power, and plenty of bass on tap thanks to a pair of end-mounted 2.8-inch passive woofers.

title: Is It Time To Ban AI Chatbots From Using Social Media?
description: Any normal person can tell the Lia chatbot on Twitter is not real.

title: A Psychologist Describes 3 Ways To Immediately Reclaim Your Hope And Happiness
description: Which path to happiness will you choose today?

title: There Is No Ending Planned For ‘The Mandalorian,’ Which Seems Bad
description: Jon Favreau wants The Mandalorian to continue on indefinitely, and there’s no specific end goal in mind.

title: One Unusual Thing You Should Do Before Destiny 2’s ‘Lightfall’
description: While I’ve already written a “Lightfall prep guide” for Destiny 2 players, full of general advice like cleaning your vault and remembering which exotics are getting buffed so you can try them out, there is one other thing you may want to do before release here.

title: One Year Later, Where’s Our ‘Elden Ring’ DLC?
description: But now that we’re a year into release here, despite Elden Ring getting a lot of balance patches and some PvP updates, we still have yet to see DLC released for it. We have yet to even have DLC announced for it,

title: Rocksteady’s ‘Suicide Squad’ Looks Like Live Service Hell
description: After 10 minutes of Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League footage and explanation from Rocksteady, the general takeaway seems to be: “Wait, that’s what this game is?”

title: Air Pollution Might Make People 16% More Likely To Die From Heart Disease
description: Living in a neighborhood with high levels of fine particulate matter (PM2.5) in the air could be wreaking havoc in people’s cardiovascular systems, particularly for those who are a part of low-income communities.

title: The Quest And Ending Changes In An ‘Evil’ Hogwarts Legacy Playthrough
description: I have just wrapped up my second playthrough of Hogwarts Legacy, as I wanted to make a few changes this time around. First, I wanted to pick a different house, and I went with Hufflepuff so I could do the only quest which takes you to Azkaban (which was underwhelming). Second, I wanted to be evil.

title: How B2B Organizations Can Triumph In A Customer-Driven World
description: 34% of B2B marketing decision-makers said their biggest challenge is creating a single view of the buyer.

title: Current Climate: Scientists Discover A Cheap Way To Recycle Plastic
description: This week’s Current Climate, which every Saturday brings you the latest news about the business of sustainability.

title: KPMG Global Study Confirms Trusting AI Remains A Major Employee Confidence Gap
description: KPMG and The University of Queensland recently released a global study of over 17,000 people in 17 countries. Major finding is that only 50 percent of the 17,000 respondents trust AI. Developing corporate purpose for effective AI governance is key  to increase employee trust in AI.

title: Electric Micromobility Growing With Scooters, Kits, Unicycles, Urban Conversion
description: A growing number of people are rolling on the smallest sizes of personal transportation that come under the umbrella term of micromobility. The trend is sparking novel new products that range from scooters and unicicyles to kits that convert pedal-powered bicycles to electric two-wheelers.

title: GeForce Now Ultimate Turns Macs Into Great Gaming Machines
description: Nvidia's upgraded cloud gaming service finally turns Macs into AAA gaming machines

title: Why Americans Are Lonely And What We Can Do About It
description: We have seen tons of resources for decreasing loneliness, but the first step toward culture change is a shift in mindset and on a personal level. It means understanding our critical need for community and not waiting until another pandemic for us to realize that loneliness has always been a problem.
